sources.title: Springfield Rifle (1952) Gary Cooper · Phyllis Thaxter
sources.description: Major Lex Kearney becomes the North's first counterintelligence officer, tasked with uncovering the identity of those behind the theft of Union horses in Colorado during the Civil War. ..

metadata.Plot: Major Lex Kearney, dishonorably discharged from the army for cowardice in battle, has actually volunteered to go undercover to try to prevent raids against shipments of horses desperately needed for the Union war effort. Falling in with the gang of jayhawkers and Confederate soldiers who have been conducting the raids, he gradually gains their trust and is put in a position where he can discover who has been giving them secret information revealing the routes of the horse shipments.
metadata.Writer: Charles Marquis Warren, Frank Davis, Sloan Nibley
metadata.Actors: Gary Cooper, Phyllis Thaxter, David Brian
